name: Ronda Karn Bellingham Homes for Sale Favorite Realtor for Whatcom & Skagit County

google_reviews.author: Demi Utley
google_reviews.review: Ronda was an amazing agent! We worked with her for the sale of our home, and everything went well thanks to her organization, attention to detail, and determination. We moved out of state before the house officially closed, but with Ronda, we never had to worry that something would be missed. I highly recommend working with her if you are buying or selling your home!

owner_response.text: Thank you Demi for trusting me in listing and selling your home, you were a dream to work with:) Ronda

google_reviews.author: Jenna Harris
google_reviews.review: Ronda is an incredible real estate agent! We feel SO grateful that we had her by our side throughout the entire process. We researched local real estate agents and spoke to a few prior to making a decision. Ronda stood out to us immediately - so it was easy for us to know we wanted to work with her. She is extremely knowledgeable, professional, and went above and beyond in so many ways. She's an amazing negotiator too, and really makes you feel like your success and happiness is her goal. Ronda and her team made our first home buying experience so smooth, stress-free, and extremely enjoyable. We found our dream home faster than expected, and knew we would miss working with her after closing. She is just amazing! If you are considering Ronda as your real estate agent, this is your sign!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Jenna! I need to come meet that cute new little puppy that you adopted:)

google_reviews.author: Andrew Mitton
google_reviews.review: Ronda has been absolutely amazing to work with every step of the way. She took the time to really understand exactly what we were looking for in our real estate purchase. Each step of the way Ronda and the team were so supportive and responsive to any questions or concerns and made our purchasing experience stress free and truly enjoyable!

owner_response.text: Thank you Andrew! I loved working with you and your family, so much so that I get to actually call you next door neighbors:) Ronda

google_reviews.author: Garrett Reynolds
google_reviews.review: Ronda did great for us.  She was very patient with us especially considering we were initially out of state buyers and she was facilitating remote viewings.  It's a very competitive market in our area and she worked very hard to find exactly what we were looking for.  Ronda responds to email, text messages, and voicemail very promptly.  She is very knowledgable about the market, and provides good advice as well.  Well done :-)

owner_response.text: Thank you Garrett! I enjoyed getting to know you and your family. Welcome back to the Pacific Northwest! Ronda

google_reviews.author: S Smith
google_reviews.review: Ronda is the best!  She is very hard working, communicates well, and really cares about her clients.   She knows the market and helps her clients connect with the best possible homes to meet their needs.  Highly recommended!

owner_response.text: Thank you Steve for appreciating my service. I do really care for my clients and am so excited to have helped you find the perfect home in our beautiful city! Ronda

google_reviews.author: Beth Williams
google_reviews.review:
Ronda is the absolute BEST !!!  She is kind, patient and extremely knowledgeable.  She always looks out for the best interest of her clients.
She can be firm with the builders when appropriate.  We have purchased many homes and she is our #1.

owner_response.text: Hi Beth, I adore you and had a great time finding you the perfect home. Ronda

google_reviews.author: Robin Riggs
google_reviews.review: Ronda was such a pleasure to work with.  Her extensive knowledge with the real estate industry was off the charts!  She was extremely responsive and very professional.  I would recommend her to anyone that I can!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Robin! You were amazing to work with as a seller too, I hope we continue our new friendship!

google_reviews.author: Jodi Heimgartner
google_reviews.review: Rhonda is very professional and a pleasure to work with.  We were relocating from another state and Rhonda stepped in to do our walk thru and anything else we needed as we couldn't be there in person.  We would highly recommend Rhonda's services.

owner_response.text: Thanks Jodi, I truly enjoyed helping you relocate! Ronda

google_reviews.author: Molly Wilson
google_reviews.review: Rhonda is extremely professional and will go out of her way to find you the right home.

owner_response.text: Thank you Molly, you are the best! Ronda

google_reviews.author: KATHERINE RODGERS
google_reviews.review: My wife and I met with different realtors through Zillow/ Redfin on our house hunt. We stuck with Ronda because she was so knowledgeable. As first time homebuyers, it was important for us to feel confident with our realtor. Everything went very smoothly. She was always available when we had questions and talked us through the entire process. I definitely recommend her! Thanks Ronda!

owner_response.text: Thank you Katherine! You and your wife were a pleasure to work with:) Ronda

Users have described their experiences as stress-free and enjoyable, specifically mentioning that Ronda’s knowledge of the real estate market reassured them during their buying or selling processes. The enthusiasm reflected in the reviews highlights her commitment to client satisfaction, with many mentioning that she made them feel cared for and supported throughout their transactions.
